description: A comprehensive chess analysis (MCP) server that provides advanced chess analysis capabilities by implementing the Chess Context Protocol Server and integrating the Stockfish engine evaluation, positional theme analysis, opening databases, and chess knowledge. Allows LLMs to validate chess moves, visualize chess board via html, and do interactive chess puzzles, this brings the powerful chess analysis ChessAgine powers to your LLM!

lichessApiKey.description: Lichess API key to access Lichess Studies

capabilities.name: get-lichess-master-games
capabilities.description: Fetch master-level games and opening statistics from Lichess for a given position

capabilities.name: get-lichess-games
capabilities.description: Fetch Lichess user games and opening statistics for a given position

capabilities.name: fetch-lichess-games
capabilities.description: Fetch the 20 most recent games for a Lichess user. Returns game details including player information, ratings, speed format, and PGN notation. Useful for analyzing a player's recent performance, openings, and game history.

capabilities.name: fetch-lichess-game
capabilities.description: Fetch a specific Lichess game in PGN format. Accepts either a full Lichess URL or a game ID. Returns the complete PGN notation with headers and moves, ready for analysis or display.

capabilities.name: fetch-chess-puzzle
capabilities.description: Fetch a random chess puzzle from Lichess database. Can filter by themes and rating range. Use this to start a puzzle session with the user.

capabilities.name: get-lichess-username
capabilities.description: Get the lichess username of current mcp user

capabilities.name: fetch-lichess-studies
capabilities.description: Fetch all studies for a given Lichess user. Returns a list of studies with their IDs, names, and timestamps. Requires either LICHESS_STUDY_TOKEN environment variable or token parameter.

capabilities.name: fetch-lichess-study-pgn
capabilities.description: Fetch a specific Lichess study in PGN format. Returns all chapters of the study as PGN. Requires either LICHESS_STUDY_TOKEN environment variable or token parameter.

capabilities.name: generate-chess-board-view-artificat-html
capabilities.description: get HTML code to render chess board artifact for given FEN and side to move in 2d or 3d view

capabilities.name: generate-dynamic-gameview-html
capabilities.description: get HTML code to render chess board for a game with multiple fens to render game view mode

capabilities.name: is-legal-move
capabilities.description: Check if a given move is legal for the provided FEN position

capabilities.name: get-boardstate-for-move
capabilities.description: Given a FEN and a move, returns a string describing the resulting board state after the move

capabilities.name: get-boardstate-for-fen
capabilities.description: Given a FEN, returns a string describing the resulting board state for that FEN

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-repertoires
capabilities.description: Fetch user's chess repertoires from the Chessboard Magic Repertoire Builder

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-games
capabilities.description: Fetch user's chess games from the Chessboard Magic Repertoire Builder

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-game-details
capabilities.description: Fetch user's single game's metadata, moves, tags, variations and comment links

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-repertoire-details
capabilities.description: Fetch user's single repertoire metadata, moves, variations and comment links

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-tcec-stats
capabilities.description: Fetch TCEC (Top Chess Engine Championship) statistics for a specific chess position

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-tcec-games
capabilities.description: Fetch TCEC games that reached a specific chess position

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-corr-stats
capabilities.description: Fetch correspondence chess statistics for a specific chess position

capabilities.name: get-chessboardmagic-corr-games
capabilities.description: Fetch correspondence chess games that reached a specific chess position

capabilities.name: get-stockfish-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze a chess position using Stockfish 17.1 WASM engine

capabilities.name: fen-openingbook-lookup
capabilities.description: Look up a fen in 12k positions of opening book to get name, moves information for fen

capabilities.name: get-stockfish-best-move
capabilities.description: Find the best move in a chess position using Stockfish 17.1 WASM engine

capabilities.name: get-stockfish-multipv-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze a chess position and get multiple best move candidates with Stocfish 17.1 WASM engine

capabilities.name: get-stockfish-batch-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze multiple chess positions in batch using Stockfish 17.1 WASM engine

capabilities.name: get-chess-knowledgebase
capabilities.description: Returns a comprehensive chess knowledgebase including Silman Imbalances, Fine's 30 chess principles, endgame principles, and practical checklists

capabilities.name: get-chessagine-stater-prompts
capabilities.description: List all available chess analysis prompt categories with their example prompts

capabilities.name: get-puzzle-themes
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available puzzle themes that can be used to filter puzzles

capabilities.name: parse-pgn-into-fens
capabilities.description: Collect a fen list of given game pgn

capabilities.name: get-fen-map-lookup
capabilities.description: Lookup fens for mapped SAN move, for given game PGN

capabilities.name: get-chessdb-analysis
capabilities.description: Fetch position analysis and candidate moves from ChessDB

capabilities.name: get-maia2-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze chess position using Maia2 neural network trained on human games at specific rating levels. Provides human-like move suggestions and evaluations tailored to player strength (1100-1900 rating).

capabilities.name: get-leela-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze chess position using Leela Chess Zero neural network. Provides strong tactical analysis with neural network evaluation and candidate moves. Uses T1-256x10 neural net, trained on self played games

capabilities.name: get-elite-leela-analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze chess position using Elite Leela Chess Zero with enhanced evaluation. Provides top-level computer analysis with deep neural network insights. Trained on 20M games from Lichess Elite Database (2500 - 3000)
